BackstoryDef.title: Colonial Pioneer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] came to the rimworlds as part of the Grand Colonization. [PAWN_pronoun] underwent extensive physical and survival training during [PAWN_pronoun] voyage. Unlike most people on this planet [PAWN_pronoun] is fully prepared.

BackstoryDef.title: Survival Expert
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] came to the rimworlds as part of the Grand Colonization. [PAWN_pronoun] is one of the most experienced members of the Colonization Force, having participated in numerous colonization attempts in their lifetime.

BackstoryDef.title: Colonial Astropath
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] came to the rimworlds as part of the Grand Colonization. [PAWN_pronoun] job was to establish a forward observation outpost, long before the main fleet arrives, to confirm that the planet was still worth the long voyage.

BackstoryDef.title: Xeno Biologist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] came to the rimworlds as part of the Grand Colonization. [PAWN_pronoun] task was to exterminate any alien diseases and other biological hazards before main Colonial Force's arrival.

BackstoryDef.title: Xeno Ecologist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is part of a professional pioneering group. [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for researching the flora and fauna of the planet before the arrival of the main Colonial Force.

BackstoryDef.title: Geologist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is part of a professional pioneering group. [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for operating the orbital detector relays to perform geological surveys of the planet before the arrival of the main Colonial Force.

BackstoryDef.title: Colonial Architect
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is part of a professional pioneering group. [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for the planning and construction of both permanent and temporary structures at the landing sites. Life on a hostile rimworld forced [PAWN_pronoun] to learn how to survive.

BackstoryDef.title: Local Diplomat
BackstoryDef.description: Most rimworlds are in a state of anarchy, but [PAWN_nameDef] worked to establish good relations with the indigenous groups on behalf of the Colonial Force.

BackstoryDef.title: Colonial Farmer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for cultivating crops as well as testing soil compatibility levels for future projects. They tracked and monitored the growth of different crops to find those most suitable for local conditions.

BackstoryDef.title: Colonial Mechanic
BackstoryDef.description: >[PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for smithing tools and replacement parts for a colony site where a stamping printer was not allocated. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a working knowledge of cutting and assembly machinery.

BackstoryDef.title: Colonial Miner
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been working in mines almost all their life. [PAWN_nameDef] Has been digging manually, with machinery, and with explosives, and has become something of an expert on the matter.
